name: “Trace On” Shirou
ability: 【CONT】 During your turn, your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +1000 power.

【ACT】 Brainstorm [(1) 【REST】 two of your characters] Reveal four cards from the top of your deck, and put them into your waiting room. For each climax revealed, search your deck for up to one character with "Shirou(士郎)" or "Saber(セイバー)" or "Rin(凛)" in its card name, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor_text: ―Trace, on.

name: “Excalibur” Saber
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your deck is five or less, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other characters with "Shirou(士郎)" or "Saber(セイバー)" or "Rin(凛)" in its card name.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put the top card of your clock into your waiting room.
flavor_text: “Excalibur”――!

name: “Unlimited Blade Works” Shirou
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand or by a "Change" effect, draw up to one card, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 [(2) Put a card from your hand into your waiting room & Put another character from your stage into your waiting room] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a card named "Unlimited Blade Works" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a character in your waiting room with the same level as that battle opponent, put it on any position of your stage, and at the beginning of your encore step, if that character is on the stage, put that character into your memory.
flavor_text:
I create a world that contains an infinite number of swords. That is the only magic
allowed to Shirou Emiya.

name: “Summoning with a Command Seal” Shirou
ability: 【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card get +500 power.
【AUTO】 When a climax is put on your climax area, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +1000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Please… Come to me… Saber!!

name: “Contract Concluded” Saber
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】, if this card's battle opponent is level 0 or lower, you may put that character into your opponent's stock. If you do, put a card from the bottom of your opponent's stock into his or her waiting room.
flavor_text: Victory is yours, Rin.

name: “King's Self-esteem” Gilgamesh
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, put the top two cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, this card gets -3000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: When I'm done with you, there won't be a single bone shard left of that counterfeiting cranium of yours!!

name: “Tough Strength” Saber
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +500 power for each of your other characters with "Shirou(士郎)" or "Saber(セイバー)" or "Rin(凛)" in its card name.
【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, your opponent may choose a character in your waiting room, and put it on the top of your deck.
flavor_text: Hurry!! Rin!!!

name: “Gate of Babylon” Gilgamesh
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, if a card named "“Gate of Babylon”" is in your climax area, put the top two cards of your deck into your waiting room. For each trigger icon revealed among those cards, perform the following action. "Deal one damage to your opponent." (This damage may be canceled)
【ACT】 [Put a 《Weapon》 character from your hand into your waiting room] This card gets +4000 power until end of turn.
flavor_text: Hero of justice? A world where no one is hurt? Don't be absurd.

name: “Serious Assault” Shirou
ability: 【AUTO】 [(1)] When this card attacks, if a card named "“Rho Aias”" is in your climax area, you may pay the cost. If you do, put X cards from the top of your deck underneath this card as a marker, and this card gets +1500 power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of 《Weapon》 or 《Jewel》 characters you have.

【AUTO】 At the beginning of your opponent's attack phase, put all markers from underneath this card into your waiting room. For each trigger icon among those cards, the character facing this card gets -1 soul until end of turn.

name: “Non-intersecting Ideals” Shirou & Archer
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your other characters, and that character gets +1500 power until end of turn.

【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Signal to Counterattack" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.
flavor_text: Shirou: "-I can't be beaten by you. I don't mind losing to someone else. But I'm not about to be beaten by myself-!"

name: “Divine Construct” Saber
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may put X cards from the top of your deck into your waiting room. X is equal to the number of characters you have with "Shirou(士郎)" or "Saber(セイバー)" or "Rin(凛)" in its card name.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, this card gets +X power until end of turn. X is equal to 500 multiplied by the number of cards in your clock.

ability: 【CONT】 All of your other characters get the following ability. "【CONT】 This card cannot side attack."

ability: 【CONT】 If the number of other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters you have is three or more, this card gets +1500 power, and this card cannot become 【REVERSE】 from your opponent character's 【AUTO】 effects.

【AUTO】 At the beginning of your climax phase, if there is a marker underneath this card, you may choose one of your opponent's level 1 or lower characters, and put it into his or her stock. If you do, put a card from the bottom of your opponent's stock into his or her waiting room, and at the beginning of your encore step, put this card into your memory.

ability: 【AUTO】 When another of your 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

ability: 【CONT】 All of your other characters with "Gilgamesh(ギルガメッシュ)" or "Archer(アーチャー)" in its card name get +500 power.

name: “Greatest Natural Enemy” Gilgamesh
flavor_text: Damn you… Damn you, damn you, damn you, damn you!!!

name: “Endless Blades” Gilgamesh
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card attacks, put the top card of your deck into your waiting room. If that card is a climax, all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.

ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card's battle opponent becomes 【REVERSE】, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one climax, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

name: “New Contract” Saber

ability: 【AUTO】 When another of your 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character attacks, this card gets +1000 power until end of turn.

If you do, choose one of your opponent's 【STAND】 level 3 or lower characters, 【REST】 it, and deal X damage to your opponent. X is equal to that character's soul. (This damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: You should actually be proud. You forced me into a magic duel.

name: “Relationship of Trust” Illya & Berserker
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other cards in the back stage with "Illya(イリヤ)" in its card name.
【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, draw up to two cards, choose a card in your hand, and put it into your waiting room.

【AUTO】 When this card attacks, if a card named "Encounter and Bond" is in your climax area, put the top five cards of your deck into your waiting room, deal X damage to your opponent, and this card gets +2000 power until end of turn. X is equal to the number of climax revealed among those cards. (This damage may be canceled)
flavor_text: Illya: "Because Berserker's stronger than anyone!"

name: “Strong Bond” Illya
ability: 【AUTO】 [(2)] When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one card named "“Relationship of Trust” Illya & Berserker", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

【AUTO】 Bond/"“Sturdy Servant” Berserker" [(1)] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "“Sturdy Servant” Berserker" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)

name: “Strongest Warrior” Berserker
ability: 【CONT】 This card cannot side attack.
【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each marker underneath this card.

【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, if the number of markers underneath this card is ten or less, put the top card of your stock underneath this card as a marker. If you do, 【REST】 this card.

name: “Confronting a King” Illya
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one character with "Berserker(バーサーカー)" in its card name, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.

【AUTO】 [(2) Return this card to your hand] When this card is frontal attacked, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose up to one card named "“Strong Will” Berserker" in your hand, and put it on this card's stage position as the defending character.

name: “A Battle of Legend” Illya
ability: 【CONT】 All of your other "“Strong Will” Berserker" get +1000 power.
【CONT】 Assist All of your characters in front of this card gets +X power. X is equal to 500 multiplied by that character's level.

name: “Strong Will” Berserker
ability: 【CONT】 This card gets +1000 power for each of your other cards in the back stage with "Illya(イリヤ)" in its card name.

name: “Further Attack” Souichirou Kuzuki
ability: 【AUTO】 Bond/"“Mage from the Age of Myths” Caster" [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is played and placed on stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "“Mage from the Age of Myths” Caster" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.)

name: “Great Magic” Caster
ability: 【CONT】 Your other character in the middle position of the center stage gets +1000 power.

【AUTO】 [Put a card from your hand into your waiting room] When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose a card named "Encounter on a Rainy Day" in your waiting room, and return it to your hand.

name: “Magic Duel” Caster
ability: 【CONT】 If there is a blue climax in your climax area, this card gets +2000 power.

name: “Swallow Reversal” Assassin
ability: 【AUTO】 When a card named "Swallow Reversal" is placed on your climax area, if this card is in your center stage, put the top three cards of your deck into your waiting room. If there is a climax among those cards, you may choose a level 1 or lower character facing this card, and put it on the bottom of your opponent's deck.
flavor_text: I will break open that belief of yours with brute force.

name: “Repeated Pursuit” Souichirou Kuzuki
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, reveal the top card of your deck. If that card is not a 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character, put it into your clock. (If it is, return the revealed card to its original place)

name: “A Short Rest” Illya
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, your opponent may draw two cards. If your opponent does, your opponent chooses two cards from his or her hand, and puts them into his or her waiting room.
flavor_text: I wonder if they'll reach here safely, though?

name: “Sturdy Servant” Berserker
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of cards in your hand is five or more, this card gets +1000 power.

【AUTO】 Encore [Put the top card of your deck into your clock] (When this card is put into your waiting room from the stage, you may pay the cost. If you do, return this card to its previous stage position as 【REST】)

name: “Fictional Heroic Spirit” Assassin
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, if the number of your other 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters is four or more, until end of turn, this card's soul does not decrease by side attacking.
flavor_text: If, that is, a man who went to his death in obscurity had such a thing as a wish…

name: “Middle of the Final Test” Illya
flavor_text: I'll summon something that won't cause me pain and isn't as scary as Berserker…

name: “Fulfilling the Wish” Souichirou Kuzuki
ability: 【CONT】 If you have another character with "Caster(キャスター)" in its card name, this card gets +1500 power.
【CONT】 The character facing this card gets +1 soul.
flavor_text: There is no need to grieve. I will fulfill your wish in your place, that's all.

name: “A Visitor” Illya
ability: 【CONT】 If the number of climax in your waiting room is six or more, this card gets -1 level while in your hand.
flavor_text:
Shirou is coming here… to the castle
where mother once stayed.

name: “Priest of Fuyuki Church” Kirei
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on the stage from your hand, choose one of your 《Master》 or 《Servant》 characters, and put it into your waiting room.

name: “Reverberation of Defeat” Assassin
ability: 【AUTO】 [Put a 《Master》 or 《Servant》 character from your hand into your waiting room] During your opponent's turn, when this card becomes 【REVERSE】 in battle, you may pay the cost. If you do, 【REST】 this card, and at the beginning of your next encore step, put this card into your memory.
flavor_text:
And here I considered myself a fair judge of women. I suppose my training in
that art is equally wanting.

name: Encounter on a Rainy Day
ability: Look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one blue character from among them, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.

name: Berserker's Will
ability: 【COUNTER】 Choose one of your characters with "Illya(イリヤ)" or "Berserker(バーサーカー)" in its card name, and put it into your waiting room. If you do, look at up to four cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one card from among them, put it into your hand, and put the rest into your waiting room.
flavor_text: You've been protecting me of your own free will, haven't you?

name: Encounter and Bond
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【DRAW】: When this card triggers, you may draw 1 card)
flavor_text: You're so strong, Berserker…

name: Official Contract
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, choose up to one blue card in your waiting room, put it into your stock, and all of your characters get +1 soul until end of turn.
flavor_text: I won't be beaten… I'm the most powerful Master in the world!

name: Granted Wish
ability: 【CONT】 All of your characters get +1000 power and +1 soul.
(【GATE】: When this card triggers, you may choose 1 climax in your waiting room, and return it to your hand)
flavor_text: After all, my wish… was already being granted until this moment.

name: Swallow Reversal
ability: 【AUTO】 When this card is placed on your climax area from your hand, draw a card, choose one of your characters, and that character gets +2000 power and +1 soul until end of turn.
